Package shapes3d.utils

Interface Summary
I_PathGen This interface defines the methods need to define a parametric path in 3D.
I_RadiusGen  
VectorConstants This interface has been included to add various constants used in the Rot class but are not part of the PVector class.
 

Class Summary
Bezier2D This class is used to represent a single Bezier curve of degree >= 2 in 2D space.
Bezier3D This class is used to represent a single Bezier curve of degree >= 2 in 3D space.
MeshSection Utility class to specify which part of the mesh to be drawn.
Messages  
Rot This class implements rotations in a three-dimensional space.
RotOrder This class is a utility representing a rotation order specification for Cardan or Euler angles specification.
Textures This class is used to load bitmap files and create images.
TubeRadius This class is used to determine the radius of a tube shape along its length as determined by the parametric variable t.
UV Simple class to hold texture coordinates.
VectorUtil This class is used internally by the library and provides some additional methods not covered in the PVector class.
